Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Garcia Simon Marchand at a golf tournament in Paris. They played a round of golf together and discussed potential business ventures, which led to a strong professional relationship.
Garcia Simon Marchand is a 70 year old and comes from France.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Garcia Simon Marchand and Chloé tied the knot in 1979. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Garcia received his secondary school diploma from Lycée Frédéric Chopin in 1973.
Garcia completed his university studies at HEC Paris in 1978.
Occupation History:
Garcia Simon Marchand is a 70 year old and comes from France.
Garcia Simon Marchand began his professional journey as a Property Manager at Groupe Casino in 1979, laying the foundation for future success.
His subsequent role was as a Developer at Unibail-Rodamco-Westfield SE, where he continued to grow professionally from 1982 till retirement.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 550000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns condo in Paris, where he resides. It is worth 1367000 EUR.

He purchased house in Brest, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 2153000 EUR.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Garcia as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
